vaccinepage.title: Jakk Mōkaj Uwaak(QR) Cabro
vaccinepage.subtitle: Kōṇaan tteiñ jako ko jan nan kōṃanṃan mokaj uwaak(QR) kabro

dashboardpage.content1: Karuwanene nan ko Iaaṃ Jarom COVID-19 Jaak Jeje Kkar. Mọọna jet tipdik lol nan bok a link nan a QR kabro kab laam jarom ar in ami COVID-19 jaak jeje. Ne eok konaan nan ded tilmaak in wa, eok kuwat mooror or ko jarom ak a kōn eoonin ko jeje eok'wotomjej bok jan ko kkar.
dashboardpage.content2: Armej tollok a nukwi Māe jeben bwijin jaak jeje doulul ippa a jalen teiñwa nōṃba or lōta jipij, moon kajjo laam jarom jaak jeje kajjitōk jepel.
dashboardpage.content3: Ko kkar naloma a ḷaaṃ jarom ar in konnaan wa jeje. Ne eok bok ami wa jan a ṃweed wōpij (Department of Defense, Indian Health Services, or Veterans Affairs (Department in jalitak, ajejin keenki jakeiie, ak jerbal)), eok naaj aikuj nan kokkeitaak ran koṃbani bwe rejetak.
dashboardpage.content4: Ne eok jeban kajjitōk tarrin ami ḷaaṃ jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje ilomej ko mmakijkij kajjitōk kajjitok (<1>FAQ</1>).

vaccineform.filloutheader: Konaan tteiñ jake ko wadu kūraaṇto nan bok a kkejel nan a QR kabro/ laam jarom ar ak ami COVID-19 jaak jeje:
vaccineform.title: Kūtarre eọroñ naan
vaccineform.subtitle: Aikuj kūraaṇto kakōḷḷe ippa*
vaccineform.phoneemailinfo: Naloma a katmāne teinwa ak lota ke Māe ḷo doulul ippa ami wa jeje. Ne eok wōjak jab bok a kkar mooror ami katmane teinwa, mālejjoñ bar mooror ami lota jipij.
vaccineform.pincode: Komanman a 4-laam jarom PIN nompa. Eoknaajr bok li kkejel nann moon he PIN nompa kab ak ami laam jarom wa jeje. *
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg1: PIN ban kopool 4 kij lokwan doon nompa
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg3: Ko PIN moon ane utaṃwe. Konaan ekajet ḷe waḷọk ko kkejel naloma nan eok nan re-moon ami PIN.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg4: Konaan ekajet ami wadu ṇae for 1 jekōn.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg5: Konaan kokkeitaak kōj ak ami keeñkikōjelbabō naloma bwe bar eọroñ naan ak jepak.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg6: Jen kuwat jab jen ami kajjitōk, konaan ekajet bar.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg7: Utaṃwe ṃool jepa, konaan ekajet bar
vaccineform.note: <0>Kōjellā:</0> Kwōj aikuij PIN eo am n̄an am kapellọke rekoot eo am ilo online.
vaccineform.checkboxdescription: Le jāāk eñeo bọọk, eok kuwat kōnnaan lọrun kaje in bōd under konnaan kab ṃweed kien ke eok kuwat ko meanwōd or jelpa/kalliṃur int ke meanwōd kab kuwat uweoṃaan kōmaroñto ak ko meanwōd pojak jeje.
vaccineform.safe: Paan, ineemman, kab tokja COVID-19 wa kuwat kiio kkake nan wotomjejjuon epepen 5 kab rutto, <1>tok wa</1>.
vaccineform.fhealthcareprofessional: Keenkikojelbabo wājepdik ak ṃōn taktō wōja
vaccineform.enterPin: Konaan moon ko PIN nomba eok kōṃanṃan nan kajjitōk akto ami wa jeje.

qrpage.title: Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am Make ilo Kein Jerbal Kapeel
qrpage.name: Etam
qrpage.minrequirementsandroid: Mennin aikuj ko rediktata: Android mottan 5 im Google Play mottan 21.18 & lonlok.
qrpage.minrequirementsios: Mennin aikuj ko rediktata: Ilo juon kein jerbal kapeel in iOS, kojerbal Safari nan am lale web eo.
qrpage.incorrect: Ne ebōd melele eo ilo rekoot in wa eo am ilo kein jerbal kapeel eo ak ejab walok juon wa kwar boke, ebōd raan ko ak etan wa eo, kwomaron aikuj kokkaal rekoot in wa eo am. <1>Kwōmaron kebaak takto eo am nan kokkaal rekoot eo am ne ejab kebaak tok kim</1>. Kim naj kebaak kwe kin ta melele ko emoj amim loi im komadmod ko kim naj kommani iloan 2-3 wiik.

receivedpage.title: Iaam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje kajjitōk rijjiit
receivedpage.content1: Ami kajjitok mmo kwo bok. Ne ko melele naloma kkars ko melele for arro kkar, eok naaj bok a kkejel nan ak ami COVID-19 jaak jeje.
receivedpage.content2: Ne eok to jab bok a kkejel tollok 24 awa, konaan ekajet bar kab kau ṃool ami atlep, raan in ḷotak, teinwa ak lota mājet ko melele naloma ilo ko alen in ami wa.
receivedpage.content3: Ne eok jeban kajjitōk tarrin ko <1>Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje</1>, jan jeban uwaak. Ilomej arro Mmakijkij Kajjitōk (<3>FAQ</3>).

faqpage.title: Kajitōk ko Ekutkut Kajitōk an WA Verify
faqpage.01question: Ta in Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online?
faqpage.01answer: <1> Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online </1> ej rekoot in wā ko ilo online ej itok jen melele ko rej bed ilo registry an kien ikijen wā. Rekoot eo online ej kwalok melele ko rej āinwōt bed ilo CDC wā in COVID-19 card eo am ej bed ilo peba: et eo etam, raan in lōtak, raan ko kwar bōk wā ko im kāin rōt wā ko kwar bōki. Rekoot eo online ej koba juon QR code me rej scan kōn juon SMART Health Card reader im ej kwalok etam, raan in lōtak, raan in wā ko, im kāin rōt wā ko kwar bōki. QR code eo ej bar juon kein kamool rekoot in wā eo am ilo kien.
faqpage.02question: Ewi wāwein aer bōktok rekoot in wā eo ao?
faqpage.02answer: N̄e rekar bukōt rekoot in kamool eo am, kwōnaj bōk juon link ilo email ak telebon nōmba eo ikijen rekoot in kamool eo. Elikin am likit 4-digit PIN nōmba eo am, kwōnij loe melele in kein kamool COVID-19 ko am āinwōt et eo etam, raan in lōtak, raan ko kwar wā, im etan wā ko. Kwōnaj bar bōk juon QR code bwe en kamool rekoot in kein kamool eo am.
faqpage.03question: Imāron̄ ke kakwon rekoot in kein kamool ao online ilo juon telebon in iPhone?
faqpage.03answer: Kwōmāron̄ kakwon rekoot in kein kamool eo am ilo online n̄an app in Apple Health ippen system in iOS 15. Kwōnij aikuij kōjerbal Safari n̄an am kadedelọk jerbal in. Bōtab, kwōmāron̄ bōk pija in screen eo am me ej kwalok <1>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online</1> im kakwone ibben pija ko ilo telebon eo am.
faqpage.04question: Imāron̄ ke kakwon Rekoot in Kein Kamool eo ao ilo juon telebon in Android?
faqpage.04answer:
Aet. Kwōmāron̄ kakwone <1>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online n̄an Google Play ewōr am Android version 5 im Google Play Services version 21.18 ak lōn̄lak.
Kwōmāron̄ bar bōk pija in screen eo am me ej kwalok <3> Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online im kakwone ibben pija ko ilo telebon eo am.
faqpage.05question: N̄e iar bar bōk wā ko jet, renij ke walok ilo rekoot in kein kamool eo ao?
faqpage.05answer:
Jab. N̄e kwar bōk bar juon wā ak wā in kakjur eo, eban walok ilo rekoot in kein kamool eo am ilo online. Kwōnij aikuij bar jino jen jinoin ilo system eo n̄an <1>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online bwe kwōn bar bōk juon QR code ekāāl.
Jej rōjan̄ bwe kwōn kōttar 3-7 raan n̄an an walok wā eo am ekāāl ilo Immunization Registry.
faqpage.06question: N̄aat enij walok wā eo ao ilo rekoot in kein kamool eo ao ilo online?
faqpage.06answer: Oktak ien ko an mōn taktō ko jakelọk melele in wā ko am n̄an Immunization Registry. Jej rōjan̄ bwe kwōn kōttar 3-7 raan n̄an an walok wā eo am ilo system in. N̄e rekoot eo am ejjab walok, kwomāron̄ <1>kūrtok kōj</1>.
faqpage.07question: Rejjab māron̄ in bukōt rekoot eo ao?
faqpage.07answer:
Ijo kwar bōk wā eo rej jakelọk rekoot in wā eo am n̄an Immunization Registry, ak remāron̄ kar lelọk melele ko rejjab dedelọk. Kōn men in, rekoot eo am emāron̄ bed ipped, ak ejjab jimwe melele ko. Waanjon̄ak:

° Telebon nōmba eo ak email address eo ejjab kar likit ak ejjab jimwe
° Oktak an jipeel et eo etam
° Raan in lōtak eo am ejjab jimwe

N̄an am bukōte rekoot eo am, kajjeon̄ in bar likit melele ko am kōn juon email ak telebon nōmba eo oktak. N̄e rekoot eo am ejjab walok, kūrlọk taktō eo am bwe ren kakāāl rekoot in wā eo am ak <1>kūrtok kōj n̄an kajitōke ad etale rekoot eo am. Jenaj kōjellāki eok kōn melele ko emōj ad loe im komadmōd ko jenaj kōmmani ilowaan 2-3 wiik.
N̄e kwar bōk wā ko am jen opiij eo an federal (āinwōt Department of Defense, Indian Health Services or Veterans Affairs) kwōnij aikuij in kūrlọk opiij ko aer n̄an jibān̄ kōn wā ko am.
faqpage.08question: Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo ao online ejjab jimwe?
faqpage.08answer: N̄e melele ko kōn rekoot in kein kamool eo am ilo online ejjab jimwe ak ejako juon wā, ebwōd raan ko ak ejjab jimwe et in wā ko, kwōj aikuij in kajimwe ak kakāāl rekoot in wā ko am. Kwōmāron̄ kūrlọk taktō eo am bwe en kakāāl rekoot eo am ak <1>kūrtok kōj</1>. Jenaj kōjellāki eok kōn melele ko emōj ad loe im komadmōd ko jenaj kōmmani ilowaan 2-3 wiik.
faqpage.09question: Ewi wāwein an jerbal system eo n̄an Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 ilo online?
faqpage.09answer: System eo n̄an <1>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 ilo online</1> ej bōk rekoot in COVID-19 jen system in immunization ko an kien. Likit et eo etam, raan in lōtak, im email ak telebon nōmba ikijen rekoot in wā eo am, inem kōmmane juon 4-digit PIN nōmba. N̄e melele ko kwar likit ej juon wōt ibben rekoot ko rekar kamool, kwōnij bōk juon text ak email ibben juon link n̄an <3> Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online</3>. Likit PIN eo am kwar kōmmane n̄an am lale rekoot eo.
faqpage.10question: Melele ko ao renij ke ittino?
faqpage.10answer:
Aet. Ilo am kanne peba eo ilo system in ejjab kamōkaj an pellọk rekoot in kein kamool eo am. Link eo n̄an rekoot in kein kamool eo ej aikuij juon PIN me kwar kōmmane im jilkinlak wōt QR code eo n̄an SMART Health Card, copy in rekoot in kein kamool eo am ej lab aer kejbaroke.
Melele ko relaplak ej bed ilo <1>https://smarthealth.cards. N̄an kejbarok melele ko am, QR code eo emāron̄ wōt scan im jerbal wōt kōn juon kein jerbal an SMART Health Card.
faqpage.11question: Imāron̄ ke jeniji PIN eo ao?
faqpage.11answer:
Aet. Enij wōr 24 awa jen ien eo kwar bōk link eo n̄an am kōmmane juon 4-digit PIN im kapellọke <1>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online. N̄e kwōjjab, link eo n̄an rekoot eo am ilo online enij ban jerbal, ak kwōmāron̄ bar jino jen jinoin im jeniji PIN eo am ilo am kōjerbale system eo n̄an <3>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 ilo online.
N̄e kwōjjab māron̄ in kememej PIN eo am, kwōmāron̄ bar anōk lajraak ko ilōn̄ im kōmmane juon PIN ekāāl elikin 24 awa.
<5>KŌJELLĀ: Eban jako QR code eo am elikin am kar kakwone im kapellọk rekoot eo am ilo online.
faqpage.12question: Men in enij ke kamool ke iar bōk wā ko?
faqpage.12answer:
Aet. Men in ej juon ilo <1>jet ian wāwein ko n̄an am kwalok <3>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online im emāron̄ print ak kwalok online. Kwōmāron̄ bar kwalok CDC COVID-19 card eo am ak rekoot in wā eo am.
Kwōjjab aikuij in bōk <5>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 ilo online. Ej juon ian wāwein ko n̄an am bōk melele ko n̄an kamool COVID-19 im ej wāwein am loe rekoot in kamool eo am ilo online. Kien eban kōmman juon system n̄an an aolep kwalok aer wā.
faqpage.13question: N̄e ij aikuij kakāāl card in wā eo ao?
faqpage.13answer: System in ej kwalok copy in rekoot in kein kamool eo am ilo online. N̄e ejako peba in rekoot in kein kamool eo am, kwōmāron̄ print rekoot eo am ilo online im kōjerbale. N̄e ejako <1>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online </1>, kwōj bar aikuij jino jen jinoin ilo system eo.
faqpage.14question: Ta enij walok n̄an melele ko ao elikin ao ajelọk?
faqpage.14answer: <1>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online</1> ej kwalok melele ko rej bed ilo peba in CDC card in wā eo am. Kwōmāron̄ kajitōk ibben burokram ko rej scan QR code eo am ilo  <3>Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online</3> ewi wāwein aer kōjerbal melele ko kwar likit ak n̄e renij kakwone. Kwe wōt māke kwōmāron̄ lōmnak kōn wāwein eo im n̄āāt kwōj ajelọk rekoot eo am.
faqpage.15question: N̄e iar kōmman appointment ko relōn̄ n̄an jejjo armij kōn juon telebon nōmba?
faqpage.15answer: N̄e kwōj jinen im jemen ak rilale n̄an rin̄anijmej eo im emōj am kōmman appointment ko relōn̄ kōn juon telebon nōmba ak email, likit kajitōk ko am juon ilọk juon n̄an am bōk link ko rejenolọk n̄an rekoot in kein kamool ko kajojo.
faqpage.needhelpcontent01: N̄an kajitōk ko im jibān̄ ko jet, kūrlọk:
faqpage.needhelpcontent05: Kilōk ilo raan in kakije ko an kien
faqpage.needhelpcontent06: <0>KŌJELLĀ:</0> Jejjab māron̄ in kakāāl Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am ilo online ilo telebon.
